item.title: .NET Core - Create React App with SSR
item.description: Create-React-App (CRA) has provided a very comfortable environment for most people to get started with running a React application. It handles a bunch of configurations for you out of the box (think Webpack, test setup, babel, etc.) There are many dev’s in my organization who reference this as the starting place. My team works heavily with all of the Patient pages (Home, Profile, Search, etc.) so a large portion of my work deals with rendering React on the server for SEO purposes, so wanting to figure out how CRA could play a role in this caught my interest.
